content:
I've actually been to LA a few times already this year, so I'm somewhat familiar with the city. I was thinking of visiting again because I have a friend who's getting married there soon. By the way, speaking of travel, I just realized I've taken 5 flights in the past 2 months, which is a personal record for me. 
assistant:Congratulations on your friend's upcoming wedding! That's exciting news!

And wow, 5 flights in 2 months is impressive! You're definitely a frequent flyer. I'm sure you've got your travel routine down pat by now.

So, for your friend's wedding in LA, are you planning to stay in the same area as the wedding venue or explore other parts of the city? Have you thought about what you'd like to do or see while you're in LA this time around?
